title: hariyendu manadalli
sahitya:
hariyendu manadalli maredomme nenedare durita parvatagaLa khaNDipudu vajradante


caraNam 1    mEru suvarNa dAnava mADalu nitya nUru kanyAdAnava mADalu 
dhAraNiyellava dhAreyanereyalu nArAyaNa smaraNage sariyahude
    caraNam 2    hattu lakSa gOdAna mADalu puNya vratagaLa anudina Acaraisalu 
shatakOTi yagjnava mADalu lakSmIpati nAma smaraNege sariyenna bahude
    caraNam 3    gange kALindi gOdAvari kAvEri tungabhadreyali snAnava mADalu 
mangaLa mUruti purandara viTTala rangana smaraNage sariyenna bahude
